title: Happy Valentine’s Day!
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Nozomi-chaaan! Happy Valentine’s Day nya! Here is Rin’s chocolate~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Happy Valentine’s Day! Waaah, it’s cat-shaped. How cute. Fufu, thank you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin made it yesterday with Kayochin and Maki-chan nya.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>This one is from me, here.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Thank you~! Uwaah, it’s so big! Can Rin open it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Sure, go ahead.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>What’s in this nya~.... NYAAAH~!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>It’s a surprise chocolate box~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>T-, that was bad for my heart nya.... But.... there’s a lot in here~! Thank you, Nozomi-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu, you’re welcome. Be careful not to eat too much at once, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
